biotools.summary:
Prediction of the Favorable Hydration Sites in a Protein Binding Pocket and Its Application to Scoring Function Formulation.

Predict potential water molecules in the protein binding pocket.

HydraMap V1.0 - Automatic Tailoring and Transplanting.

We developed an empirical method for predicting the favorable hydration sites in a protein binding pocket.
